name: electronic component production, passive, mobile, earpiece and speaker | electronic component, passive, mobile, earpiece and speaker | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24552/documentation

This activity represents the production of 1kg of an earpiece and speaker used in a smartphone (Fairphone 1). The unit of kg was chosen for the dataset to be scalable. The materials used were identified by composition analysis and inserted as raw materials. According to the source the unidentified materials were added as "electronic components, passive, unspecified" and the production effort was approximated by "inductor, auxilliaries and energy use". ;Source: Güvendik, M. (2014). From smartphone to futurephone: assessing the environmental impacts of different circular economy scenarios of a smartphone using LCA.

From reception of materials and auxiliares at the factory gate. 

The activity includes the materials, processes and energy (included through processing datasets) use for the production of a set of earpiece and speaker used in mobile phones. Data on factory and packaging are not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data for composition are from 2014 but represent current technology.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average electronic device.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Literature source points to manufacturing in China. Production efforts and energy use are included with "inductor, auxilliaries and energy use".
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data from Güvendik, 2014 was scaled by mass to fit the reference product of 1kg.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The materials were determined by composition analysis (Güvendik, 2014). Unidentified materials were added as "electronic components, passive, unspecified". The production effort was approximated by "inductor, auxilliaries and energy use".
